name: FistMeBro!
description:
Make sure you don't let your bros hanging, you might just end up with no friends...

-Punch each Enemy with the respective Fist

-Don't miss or they'll punch you

-Don't punch with the wrong fist or you'll get punched as well

This is my first game. I'm open to constructive FEEDBACK, this has been an experience for me and my partner and I thank Yoyo Games for that!

Enjoy!

@new_name
